entry.tran: 实用的;为实用而设计的
entry.def: Functional things are useful rather than decorative.

entry.tran: 工作(或运转)方式的;功能性的
entry.def: Functional means relating to the way in which something works or operates, or relating to how useful it is.

example.ex: ...rules defining the territorial boundaries and functional limits of the local state.
example.tran: 划定本州地界并明确政府职权的章程

entry.tran: 在工作的;在起作用的;运转正常的
entry.def: Functional equipment works or operates in the way that it is supposed to.

example.ex: We have fully functional smoke alarms on all staircases.
example.tran: 我们在各层楼梯都安装有完全可用的烟雾警报器。
